title: Bandits Abduct Niger Electoral Commissioner, Dozens of Travellers
description: Over 30 people, including senior state officials, were kidnapped by armed bandits along Zugurma-Ibbi road in Niger State.

title: Concerns as bandits continue to unleash terror on security operatives
description: Security operatives in Nigeria have come under several attacks by criminal elements in the past few weeks, leading to the killing of scores of them.
